Package com.jme3.bullet.collision

Class ContactPointFlag

java.lang.Object
com.jme3.bullet.collision.ContactPointFlag
public class ContactPointFlag extends Object
Named flags for a PhysicsCollisionEvent. See btContactPointFlags in https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/master/src/BulletCollision/NarrowPhaseCollision/btManifoldPoint.h
See Also:
